title: [Bug]: Teams window sharing uses very low resolution
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Sharing a screen uses 192X108 resolution

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.9

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Log in
2.Join a meeting
3.share a screen
   -> shared screen is at a VERY low resolution: 192X108 (This looks like 10% of 1920X1080)  The lowered resolution makes it difficult to present and share desktop.
...
This seems intermittent or timing related. It happens 90% of the time when I attempt it. It does not seem related to internet speed or processing power. Neither does it seem to be respecting the resolution that I specifically select when sharing a specific screen.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.Log in
2.Join meeting
3.Share screen, but screen is at appropriate resolution
...
```

### Debug



